summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2272 for the improvement of West Fifty-seventh Street, from Twentieth Avenue Northwest to Twenty-second Avenue Northwest, all in The City of Seattle, by constructing a sewer therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all catch basins, manholes and flush tanks and other appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district; under Ordinance No. 23439, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
